name: Chipotle Cheeseburgers
author: Tabasco
summary: Smoke the competition at your tailgate by adding TABASCO® Chipotle Sauce to your burger.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons TABASCO® brand Chipotle Pepper Sauce, divided
6 slices Monterey Jack or Cheddar cheese
directions: Combine ground beef, 2 tablespoons of the TABASCO® Chipotle Sauce and salt in a large bowl and mix well; shape into 6 patties
Combine mayonnaise with remaining 1 tablespoon TABASCO® Chipotle Sauce and mix well; set aside
Grill or broil hamburger patties to desired doneness; place cheese slices on burgers and continue cooking just until cheese melts
Spread mayonnaise on buns and top each with lettuce, burger, tomato and onion
